synopsis.text: In the perpetually dark city of Salta, home to a unique community of vampires, a young vampire boy named Hipira embarks on a series of thrilling escapades. Despite his vampiric nature, Hipira leads a life akin to any ordinary boy, navigating the trials of school and confronting bullies. Yet, his insatiable curiosity and adventurous spirit often lead him astray, entangling him in encounters with peculiar creatures, from colossal frogs to extraterrestrial beings. With his quick wit and unwavering courage, Hipira not only overcomes these challenges but also forges unconventional friendships, even with a human soul. His daring exploits, filled with pranks and exploration, promise a captivating journey through a world where darkness is not a hindrance, but an invitation to extraordinary adventures.
